blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

tags: i’m pulling my hair out y’all
summary: In an alternate universe:
body:
In an alternate universe:

Dan and Phil post a video. Instead of the tag being filled with posts about how “gay” the video was, people use actual adjectives.


“This video was so funny!”

“Can they get any more charming?”

“They keep getting more and more creative with every video!”


Seems so dystopian. Totally unrealistic.

reblog.comment:
In an alternate universe:

Dan and Phil post a video. Instead of the tag being filled with posts about how “gay” the video was, people use actual adjectives.


“This video was so funny!”

“Can they get any more charming?”

“They keep getting more and more creative with every video!”


Seems so dystopian. Totally unrealistic.

trail.content_raw:
In an alternate universe:

Dan and Phil post a video. Instead of the tag being filled with posts about how “gay” the video was, people use actual adjectives.


“This video was so funny!”

“Can they get any more charming?”

“They keep getting more and more creative with every video!”


Seems so dystopian. Totally unrealistic.
trail.content:
